objects.text: • PREMIUM VELVET • GOLD LEGS • MODERN DESIGN

product_details.name: Luxe Velvet Dining Chair - Modern Channel-Tufted Accent Chair with Gold Legs
product_details.description:
• Premium teal velvet upholstery for elegant comfort and style
• Channel-tufted backrest design adds sophisticated texture
• Sturdy gold-finished metal legs for modern glamour
• Comfortable armrest design for extended seating comfort
• Perfect for dining room, living room, or home office spaces
• Elegant vertical channel stitching detail
• Plush padded seat cushion for maximum comfort
• Mid-century modern meets contemporary aesthetic
• Durable construction supports up to 250 lbs
• Easy assembly required
• Compact size ideal for space-efficient seating
• Stain-resistant velvet fabric for easy maintenance

banner_details:
This banner features a bold, modern design with a strong focus on vibrant green and deep dark themes. It presents a central product image ("product_image") of a blue velvet chair with gold legs, placed within concentric white and dashed circular outlines. The top section highlights urgency and branding with three text layers: "heading" emphasizes the brand in luminous green, "subheading" reinforces the quick service aspect, and "tagline" highlights the delivery speed in clean white.

A pricing bubble ("price") emerges from a green radial circle on the right, drawing attention to affordability. Below the product, two lines — "description_1" and "description_2" — give geographical coverage and product features respectively, both in white text. At the bottom, a green call-to-action box ("cta_background") holds the action text ("cta") encouraging purchases.

Subtle graphic lines add motion, while green and purple accents give modern vibrancy.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: `#0A0A0A` (background)
- Neon Green: `#12F040` (headings, highlights, CTA background)
- White: `#FFFFFF` and `#f7f9fb` (texts, strokes)
- Blue: From product image (deep velvet texture)
- Gold: Chair legs (metallic accent)
- Purple: `#442378` (circular stroke elements)
product_color: The product image features a modern teal velvet chair paired with gold metal legs, ideal for a chic and luxurious design scheme. The rich teal color (Hex #155E6E) dominates visually, exuding elegance and comfort, while the gold legs (Hex #D4AF37) add a touch of sophistication and contrast, drawing the eye downward gracefully. The neutral white tabletop (Hex #F5F5F5) and soft gray fabric (Hex #B0B0B0) balance the bold colors, softening the overall presentation. A pop of green from the mini plant (Hex #82A570) infuses freshness. These shades blend harmoniously while allowing each to shine individually, creating a refined and inviting look.
